::Hot Rod::

His face became very serious.
"You...."
He figured he better explain, to the others.
"As you know, although officialy there is peace on Cybertron, there are
many little skirmashes that come up. When I finally made my way back to
Cybertron, after my time missing, I lead a small group of Maximals. It
was only for a short period, while the Maximal elders completed work on
the Maximal Matrix, and sent me here. During that period these Predacons
defected and helped us. They must have been betrayed by the Maximal
commanders as I was leaving."
He looked back to them.
"I'm sorry for what ever happaned to you. I should have made sure you
were given protection. But may I ask, why were you attacking the
Chivtron's?"
